amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce each amount made available by this Act by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record numbered 7 to reduce each amount made available by this Act by 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 259 (Roll no. 310).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 259 (Roll no. 310).
